message.name: fileSent
message.content: I approve the content of the file {{this.senderDocument.file}}. This file will be sent to {{this.senderDocument.recipientEmail}} for review.

message.name: accept
message.content: I approve the content of the file {{last.senderDocument.file}} sent by {{last.senderDocument.senderEmail}} with the following comment: "{{this.recipientAnswer.comment}}".

message.name: decline
message.content: I decline the file {{last.senderDocument.file}} sent by {{last.senderDocument.senderEmail}} with the following comment: "{{this.recipientAnswer.comment}}".
